snippet: Kara Walker’s “A Subtlety, or the Marvelous Sugar Baby,” which has been cut up and cleaned and taken away for recycling, is a contribution to the grand tradition of ephemeral art.
abstract: Kara Walker sculpture A Subtlety, or the Marvelous Sugar Baby, which graced Domino factory in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, for only two months before condominium construction began at site, is just latest example of grand tradition of ephemeral art.
lead_paragraph: Kara Walker’s “A Subtlety, or the Marvelous Sugar Baby,” which has been cut up and cleaned and taken away for recycling, is a contribution to the grand tradition of ephemeral art.

headline.seo: Kara Walker’s Sphinx and the Tradition of Ephemeral Art
